items.sentence: Since I didn't eat anything for breakfast, I'm very hungry now.

Tom made a great deal of money selling things that he'd stolen.

It's one of the most difficult things that I've ever had to do.

To have doubts about oneself is the first sign of intelligence.
You shouldn't read people's private letters without permission.
